name: @ocubist/error-alchemy
description: A powerful Node.js error-handling-framework with custom error types for easy debugging, enhanced error management, strong zod-support and useful quality-of-life-functionality for asserting and validating values.

scripts.new-project: npm install zod && npm install --save-dev @types/jest jest rimraf ts-jest ts-node typescript
scripts.publishProject: npm run build && npm publish --access public
scripts.clean-install: rimraf node_modules dist && npm install && npm run build

author: ocubist
